content: last stitch from the thumb gusset and then pick up an additional 5 stitches from the place where the sides joined knit these stitches through the back loop this will twist the stitch and will close the loop knit two rounds and then try them on if the thumb is too small or two large you can make adjustments at this time if too small m1l between stitch 17 and 18 if too large k2tog after stitch 16 knit all stitches in the round until the thumb reaches the desired length approximately one inch bind off weave in ends hand wash mitts in warm soapy water rinse in warm water towel dry lay flat to dry west coast mittens updated may 22 2021 4
